page.title: 12DAIRY/BEEF PRODUCTION.
page.content: 2 Dairy Farms using Friesian & Holstein Cows.Expected yeild 5,000 _ 7,000litres per 305 day milk cycle. Paid on quanity & quality _level of Butter Fat,Lactose,Protein & Hygiene better the quality more profitable the milk.Milking twice daily _ Riverside Farm upgraded Milk Parlour to enable ONE person to milk 80 cows. Beef Production 2 units currently rearing calves & fattening bullocks planning to reduce system increase sheep enterprise more profitable. Problems for all Farmers,summer 1985 hay & silage,winter feed normally completed by July,this year very little good quality hay produced mainly Big Bale Silage taking until until mid Sept.to complete. Farming in an area such as this all lifestock,with the exception of sheep live 6mths.inside & 6mths.outside.
